好的描写需要：1) 感官描写 - 视觉（颜色、形状）、听觉（声音）、嗅觉（气味）、触觉（质感）、味觉。2) 比喻 - 像、如、仿佛。3) 动作描写 - 具体动词而非笼统词。弱：他很高兴。强：他脸上绽放

• 50% means 50 out of 100, or 0.5, or 1/2

Concept: Convert between percentages, decimals, and fractions.

Percentage to Decimal: Divide by 100

Concept: x% of y = (x/100) × y

Method: Convert to decimal, then multiply

Example: Find 30% of 80
3

Concept: Apply percentage changes

Increase: New = Original × (1 + %)
Example: Increase $50 by 20%
$

PARALLEL LINES never meet, always same distance apart. Symbol: ||. WHEN TRANSVERSAL CROSSES PARALLEL

needUpdate.title: Particulate Model of Matter
issues: 5 text section(s) without following examples

structure.contentPreview: All matter is made of tiny particles in constant random motion. Particles have spaces between them.
ParticlesInStates
Particles packed very closely in fixed regular pattern. Very little space between. Particles vibrate
Particles close together but not in fixed positions. Small spaces between. Random arrangement. Parti
Particles very far apart. Large spaces between. Completely random. Particles move very fast in all d
Net movement of particles from higher to lower concentration due to random motion. Occurs in liquids
Random zigzag movement of small particles suspended in fluid. Caused by invisible molecules constant

structure.contentPreview: A FORCE is a push or pull. Force is a VECTOR with magnitude and direction. Measured in NEWTONS (N).
Use SPRING BALANCE (newton-meter). Greater force → more stretch. Read scale in NEWTONS (N). WEIGHT v
Forces equal in size, opposite directions. Resultant force = 0 N. Effect: Stationary stays stationar
Forces NOT equal. Net/resultant force exists. Object ACCELERATES (changes speed or direction). Large
ForceMotion
Force opposing motion between surfaces. Always acts OPPOSITE to motion. Caused by surface roughness.
Object at rest stays at rest, object in motion stays in motion at constant velocity, unless acted up

needUpdate.title: Energy, Work & Power
issues: 2 text section(s) without following examples

structure.contentPreview: Energy is ability to do work (measured in Joules, J). Main forms: KINETIC (moving objects: KE = ½mv²
Energy changes from one form to another. Examples: LIGHT BULB: Electrical → Light + Heat. PHOTOSYNTH
LAW OF CONSERVATION OF ENERGY: Total energy in isolated system remains constant. Energy input = Usef
Work = Force × Distance (W = Fd) in Joules (J). Power = Work / Time (P = W/t) in Watts (W).

Liquid pressure INCREASES with DEPTH. Why? More liquid above = more weight = more pressure. Pressure

Forces equal in size, opposite directions. Resultant force = 0 N. Effect: Stationary stays stationar
Forces NOT equal. Net/resultant force exists. Object ACCELERATES (changes speed or direction). Large

Work = Force × Distance (W = Fd) in Joules (J). Power = Work / Time (P = W/t) in Watts (W).
